name: vscode-comfyui-linker
description: Generate AI images with ComfyUI workflows directly in VSCode. Enter text prompts, monitor real-time progress via WebSocket, and auto-save outputs to your workspace.

commands.title: ComfyUI: Generate Image from Image and Prompt

comfyui.serverUrl.description: Base URL of the ComfyUI server.

comfyui.workflowTemplate.description: JSON template for the text-to-image workflow. Use {{prompt}} as a placeholder.

comfyui.promptNodeId.description: The ID of the node that receives the text prompt.

comfyui.promptInputKey.description: The key for the prompt input within the node.

comfyui.workflowTemplateImg2Img.description: JSON template for the image-to-image workflow. Use {{prompt}} for text and the image node for the image.

comfyui.imgNodeId.description: The ID of the node that receives the input image for img2img.

comfyui.imgNodeInputKey.description: The key for the image input within the img2img node.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
